mil3.1.15:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil3.1.15:0.3_0: dedicated to the mark of wisdom.
mil3.1.15:1.2_0: “What is the radiance of a great man?”
mil3.1.15:1.4_0: one who has cut off the marks of wisdom, and even as a finger-snap.”
mil3.1.15:1.6_0: “Great king, that wisdom arise in the dark of night. They generate knowledge, try to give rise to ignorance, and then they make a catch the noble truth.
mil3.1.15:1.7_0: If you say, ‘This is impermanent’ or ‘mine’ or ‘This is suffering’, you will have right understanding.’
mil3.1.15:2.2_0: “Great king, as they entered the darkness so that they become clear, and overcome by darkness, the light entering and remain in the dark of night.
mil3.1.15:2.3_0: In the same way, wisdom arise in the dark of wisdom. They generate enthusiasm to stop trying to give rise to ignorance, and they experience knowledge of the noble truths.
mil3.1.15:2.4_0: Seeing this, one should truly see with right understanding: ‘This is impermanent’ or ‘This is suffering’.
mil3.1.15:4.1_0: The group of wisdom is finished.
